You can use it for a host a website, gameserver, or whatever else is on your mind! Best of all, this new VPS service is on the Premium EvoSwitch Network. That means the fastest speeds world wide!


All plans include:
  • Premium 1000mpbs Connection (1 Gbps)
  • A large choice of OSes
  • Private IP
  • Own subdomain
  • Root Access
  • Provide a variety of scripts for automated install
  • Solusvm Control Panel (Reboot / Reinstall + More)

Where will the Server be hosted?

All of our new VPS servers are situated in EvoSwitch (Netherlands) connected through the famous LeaseWeb network, proven to be one of the best Tier 1 bandwidth suppliers in the world. Boasting over 1.5 Tbps of high speed connectivity to various worldwide telecom suppliers we can provide the performance and reliability that you expect for your hosting infrastructure.

Can you use torrents
Yes!
